name: Sneaky Kitten (itch)
description:
Sneaky Kitten is a family-friendly non-violence game, where you play as a cat to collect coins and other trinkets. Do this by solving problems and sneaking past non-friendly dogs.

This game is under development and has a target audience of six to twelve year olds, if you have children in these ages, we would love if they could test it.

This game supports Gamepads.

We do not have an in-game menu, if you want to quit the game during playtime, press Escape or Pause on the gamepad!

Please take some time to fill out our feedback form:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1--DWZzf1-9jUPLBf5EH_wZ0cNH0Pk4tij56_hHPxwXA/vie...

Wish list our game on steam if you like it! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1408480/Sneaky_Kitten/
